flavorText: The energy that infuses the rings with life also melts them away, leaving only useless puddles of slag.

foreignData.flavorText: Die Energie, die die Ringe mit Leben erfüllt, schmilzt sie gleichzeitig hinweg und hinterlässt nur Schlackehäufchen.
foreignData.name: Chimärenspulen
foreignData.text: {X}{1}: Die Chimärenspulen werden zu einer X/X Artefaktkreatur. Opfere sie am Ende des Zuges.

foreignData.flavorText: La energía que da vida a los anillos también los funde, dejando sólo charcos de escoria.
foreignData.name: Bobinas quiméricas
foreignData.text: {X}{1}: Las Bobinas quiméricas se convierten en una criatura artefacto X/X. Sacrifícalas al final del turno.

foreignData.flavorText: L'énergie qui donne vie aux anneaux les transforme aussi en flaques de métal en fusion inutilisables.
foreignData.name: Annelures chimériques
foreignData.text: {X}{1} : Les Annelures chimériques deviennent une créature-artefact X/X. Sacrifiez-les à la fin du tour.

foreignData.flavorText: L'energia che permea di vita gli anelli li fa anche fondere, lasciando solo inutili pozze di scorie.
foreignData.name: Spirali Chimeriche
foreignData.text: {X}{1}: Le Spirali Chimeriche diventano una creatura artefatto X/X. Sacrificale alla fine del turno.

foreignData.flavorText: 輪に生命をもたらすべく注入されたエネルギーは、一方でそれを溶かしてしまう。あとに残るのは使えない屑鉄の塊だけだ。
foreignData.name: キマイラ・コイル
foreignData.text: {X}{1}：キマイラ・コイルはX/Xのアーティファクト・クリーチャーになる。ターン終了時にそれを生け贄に捧げる。

foreignData.flavorText: A energia que instila vida nos anéis também os derrete, deixando apenas montes inúteis de escória.
foreignData.name: Espirais Quiméricas
foreignData.text: {X}{1}: Espirais Quiméricas torna-se uma criatura artefato X/X. Sacrifique-a no final do turno.

foreignData.flavorText: 注入环间的生命能量同时使其融解，最终只剩熔渣数滩。
foreignData.name: 盖美拉盘卷
foreignData.text: {X}{1}：盖美拉盘卷成为X/X的神器生物。在回合结束时将之牺牲。

name: Chimeric Coils
originalText: {X}{1}: Chimeric Coils becomes an X/X artifact creature. Sacrifice it at end of turn.

rulings.text: If X is 0, Chimeric Coils becomes a 0/0 creature and is put into its owner’s graveyard.

A noncreature permanent that turns into a creature can attack, and its {T} abilities can be activated, only if its controller has continuously controlled that permanent since the beginning of their most recent turn. It doesn’t matter how long the permanent has been a creature.

text: {X}{1}: Chimeric Coils becomes an X/X Construct artifact creature. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.
